Primary Energy: Earth 4 (reshaping natural stone) Supporting Energy: None (touch, instantaneous/permanent) Range: Touch Duration: Instantaneous (permanent) Total Cost: 4 Energy per 5ft cube Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Earth Potential + Earth Mastery Effect: Reshape natural stone into any form (crude weapons, doors, passages). More effective than Shape Stone on natural stone. Changes are permanent. Saving Throw: None (environmental manipulation) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 2ft cube, 2 = 5ft cube, 3 = 10ft cube, 4 = 20ft cube
